Title: Dambis
Actors: Makarand Anaspure, Shubhankar Atre, Lokesh Gupte, Prajyot Kadu
Plot: A small-time actor Dattu is made to act as a grandfather by Siddanth to his own son Parth because he misses his grandparents. Parth and Dattu develop affection towards each other, but what will be the end of this fake relationship?
